name: Chat Without Contact
author: Sumanta Dhank

sections.installation:
1. Download chat-without-contact zip file
  2. Upload the ‘chat-without-contact’ zip and its contents into the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation
  3. Activate Chat Without Contact from Plugins menu in WordPress.

Requirements

  • WordPress version: >= 5.0
  • PHP version: >= 7.2
